PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , substitution at the imide nitrogen allows introduction of functionalities and solubility improvement with varying degrees of steric bulk while not impinging on critical intermolecular π-π stacking characteristics.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| substitution at the imide nitrogen |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| functionalities |
| steric bulk |
| critical intermolecular π-π stacking characteristics |

Explanation:

* "substitution at the imide nitrogen" is a process or action, not a property value.
* "introduction of functionalities" and "steric bulk" are property values.
* "not impinging on critical intermolecular π-π stacking characteristics" is a property value, but it describes a relationship between two properties, so it is not presented as a separate entity. Instead, it is included as part of the description for the "critical intermolecular π-π stacking characteristics" property.
